events.message: The policyholder has reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 4th, involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report that details a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to provide the policyholder with assistance and guide through the process.
The claim has been acknowledged officially, and the claimant was informed of the next steps and required documentation.
The claimant was requested to submit police reports, photographs of the damaged car, and the driver's license for thorough evaluation.
Claimant has submitted all requested documents including the accident report, pictures of the vehicle damage, and personal identification.
The investigation into the details of the vehicle collision, liability, and extent of damage has commenced in order to process the claim accurately.
The investigation has been completed confirming the claimantâ€™s liability and verifying the damages sustained during the collision.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the claimant based on the damage assessment and policy coverage limits.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the clarity and timeliness of the claim process and the settlement proposal.
The claim has been approved after the claimant accepted the settlement offer and provided necessary consent to proceed with payment.
The payment for the approved claim was successfully issued to the claimant's designated bank account for vehicle repair.
The claim has been closed following the finalization of the payment and the claimant confirmed full satisfaction with the resolution.
